ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Covers basic dynamics of both the atmosphere and ocean. If you understand differential equations, you can take this class even if you don't have extensive knowledge of the Earth system or climate.
I will definitely recommend. This course is very comprehensive in understanding the big picture of climates.
I recommend taking this course, especially if one wants to get an overall understanding of climate dynamics.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course gives me a big picture of climate dynamics, connecting everything happening now, in the past and in the future.
Most topics are relevant to my research
